name: Summer Valley [Story Game]
description:
girl who went to grandmom's house in summer vacation
many animal friends which meet them by farming and fishing
accordign to old story, you get familiar with animal, animal looks like person..
ending illustration is bonus!!
See great animal friends right now!!

▼ well-made story game
usinig various items and hints,you can tell a story.

▼ simple and clean interface
even users, who has burdensome for various navvy RPG game,can play it easily.

▼ game with classic homesickness
It is of classical style of dot, so you can feel homesickness of old RPG game.

▼ animal friends getting familiar, whenever intimacy is built!!
Have intimacy, so have bonus illustration!
